ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Deploying and managing headful browser instances in Docker for web automation, testing, and scraping tasks, while abstracting away infrastructure complexities.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Parallelism â€¢ Chrome DevTools Protocol â€¢ Headful Browsers â€¢ Live View â€¢ Persistent Sessions (S3)
ðŸ“– Summary: BlitzBrowser provides a managed Docker environment for running headful browsers, simplifying deployment and scaling. It allows direct connection from automation frameworks like Puppeteer and Playwright, offering features like live viewing, persistent sessions via S3, and proxy support without requiring extensive DevOps knowledge.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸ”¥ VibeNVR | JavaScript
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Setting up and managing a local, privacy-respecting video surveillance system for IP cameras without relying on cloud services.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Modern Web Interface (React, Vite) â€¢ Customizable Dashboard â€¢ Secure JWT Authentication â€¢ Advanced Video Engine (Python, OpenCV, FFmpeg) â€¢ Passthrough Recording (Direct Stream Copy)
ðŸ“– Summary: VibeNVR is a privacy-focused, local Network Video Recorder (NVR) system designed for efficient video surveillance. It offers a modern React-based interface, a custom high-performance video engine using Python, OpenCV, and FFmpeg, and features like smart motion detection, a unified event timeline, and secure authentication, all deployable via Docker.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸ”¥ ScreenCoder | Python
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Automating the conversion of UI designs or screenshots into editable HTML/CSS code for front-end development.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ UI screenshot to HTML/CSS code generation â€¢ Modular multi-agent architecture â€¢ Visual understanding and layout planning â€¢ Adaptive code synthesis â€¢ Customizable modifications for layout and styling
ðŸ“– Summary: ScreenCoder is an intelligent system that converts UI screenshots into production-ready HTML/CSS code. It utilizes a modular multi-agent architecture for visual understanding, layout planning, and adaptive code synthesis, enabling accurate and editable front-end code generation.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

âœ¨ devFind | JavaScript
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: A platform for developers to showcase their skills and for others to find and connect with them.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Developer profile creation in JSON format â€¢ Searchable platform for discovering developers â€¢ Search by skills, location, or name â€¢ Facilitates connection for collaboration or employment
ðŸ“– Summary: devFind is an open-source platform designed for developers to create profiles showcasing their skills and connect with potential collaborators. Profiles are created in JSON format and are discoverable through a user-friendly, searchable interface.
